data.title: Martin Vician - 2022 - Men's Soccer

Martin Vician (11) F  - Career Highs:

Goals: 2 (3x, last vs. Quinnipiac, 9/17/22)

2022
data.text:
Career Highs:

Goals: 2 (3x, last vs. Quinnipiac, 9/17/22)

Assists: 2 (at Cornell, 10/9/21)

Points: 4 (4x, last vs. Quinnipiac, 9/17/22)

2022 • Senior:

Earned Second Team All-Ivy honors … Gained College Sports Communicators Academic All-District accolades … Started all 17 games … Ranked 25th in the NCAA in shot accuracy (.546) and 43rd in shots on goal per game (1.35) … Stood first on the team in goals (six), third in points (13), second in shots (41), second in shots on goal (23), and second in game-winning goals (two); added one assist … Scored two goals apiece in back-to-back games with braces at Northeastern (Sept. 13) and vs. Quinnipiac (Sept. 17) … Notched three points on a goal and an assist vs. Fairfield (Sept. 24) … Netted the game-winning goal vs. No. 15 Penn (Oct. 29) …

2021 • Junior:

Earned Second Team All-Ivy honors … Gained Academic All-Ivy accolades … Garnered Ivy League Player of the Week twice (Nov. 8, Nov. 15) … Ranked 37th in the NCAA in goals per game (0.53) … Stood fifth in the Ivy League in points (19) … In Ivy only play, ranked first in goals (six), second in points (15), and fifth in assists (three) … Played in 15 games with 14 starts … Totaled 19 points on eight goals and three assists on the year … Scored two goals vs. Penn (Nov. 13) … Posted one goal and two assists at Cornell (Oct. 9) … Registered one goal and one assist at Columbia (Nov. 6) … Tallied one goal in each of four other games – at Central Conn. St. (Sept. 5), vs. Boston University (Oct. 5), vs. Brown (Oct. 16), and vs. Dartmouth (Oct. 30) … Totaled 28 shots and 12 shots on goal on the season.

2020 • Sophomore:

Season canceled due to COVID-19.

2019 • First-year:

Appeared in four games … Made career debut and scored first collegiate goal in the 71st minute at Vermont (Sept. 13) … Fired three shots in the home opener against Merrimack (Sept. 24) … Suffered a season ending injury.

Before Harvard:

2009-2017 SK Slovan Bratislava (Slovakia) U10 to U19 (midfielder/forward) … 2017-2018 FC Banik Ostrava (Czech republic) U19/U21 (midfielder/forward) … 2018-19 FC Petrzalka Senior team (Slovakia) (midfielder/forward) … SK Slovan Bratislava U10 to U19 (Slovakia); 1. Division Youth League … FC Banik Ostrava (Czech Republic) U19; 1. Division Youth League … FC Banik Ostrava (Czech Republic) U21; 1. Division U21 League … FC Petrzalka Senior team (Slovakia); 2. Division Senior National League … Captain of SK Slovan Bratislava U10 to U19 … Season 2013-14 League title with SK Slovan Bratislava U15; the league top scorer … The most starts and goals for youth national team of Slovakia; 51 starts for national team of Slovakia (U16-U19) with 13 goals scored … Season 2015-16; the second place in the national U19 league with SK Slovan Bratislava U19 … National team: The first place at qualification tournament for UEFA U17 Championship in Hungary, the first place at qualification tournament for UEFA U19 Championship in Turkey, the second place at an international tournament in China (PANDA CUP) … Studied at bilingual section and graduated from English at C1 level.
